function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dissemination of COVID-19 cases shown on the map","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 to areas with higher incidence of confirmed cases","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures such as testing, contact tracing, and quarantine","Technologies":"GIS mapping, data analytics, contact tracing apps","People":"Population in areas with higher confirmed cases, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Adoption of digital tooling in municipalities","Impact":"Unequal access to digital tools leading to disparities in response and control of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide equal access to digital tools, invest in digital literacy programs","Technologies":"Digital platforms for communication and data sharing, online survey tools","People":"Residents of municipalities, local government officials","Owner":"Government agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"City awarded in technology and innovation axis","Impact":"Potential concentration of resources and innovation in certain cities, leading to disparities in disease response","Mitigation":"Promote resource sharing and collaboration between cities, invest in technology infrastructure in underserved areas","Technologies":"Smart city technology, data-driven decision-making tools","People":"Residents of cities with and without technology awards, local government officials","Owner":"Government agencies, local authorities"}]}
